module.name: Contact Manager
module.changelog: *12.0.5* Remove beta *12.0.4* FREEPBX-10303 Allow apostrophes in group names *12.0.3* FREEPBX-9098 Increase timeout and max file size for contact import. *12.0.2* FREEPBX-8386 Add tel: into contact manager. Readjust other values. *12.0.1* FREEPBX-8557 allow editing contacts in UCP *12.0.0beta14* FREEPBX-8305 Populate placeholders for users when creating/editing an entry *12.0.0beta13* FREEPBX-8514 websites for contact manager not displaying http by default *12.0.0beta12* FREEPBX-8366 Allow searching and sorting of contacts in UCP *12.0.0beta11* FREEPBX-8426 dont control miscdests orphan checking *12.0.0beta10* Make address a textarea *12.0.0beta9* Add CSV import/export of contacts *12.0.0beta8* FREEPBX-8203 contacts manager as destination *12.0.0beta7* Updates for xmpp display, internal number display and ordering of actions *12.0.0beta6* Allow hiding users in user manager from contact manager *12.0.0beta5* If its a number then strip all non digits *12.0.0beta4* Click to action support. Also fixed internal contact lookups *12.0.0beta3* UCP Global Support *12.0.0beta2* Add additional external contact fields. *12.0.0beta1* First beta release.
